name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Michael J. PISKANIN (a/k/a Michael John Piskanin, Jr.), Petitioner v. Kelly L. BANACH and William H. Platt and James B. Martin, Esq. and Tammy Ferguson, Warden, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Commonwealth ex rel. Piskanin v. Banach

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Michael J. PISKANIN (a/k/a Michael John Piskanin, Jr.), Petitioner v. Kelly L. BANACH and William H. Platt and James B. Martin, Esq. and Tammy Ferguson, Warden, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of March, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED. Furthermore, the Prothonotary is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
111 A.3d 168
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Michael J. PISKANIN (a/k/a Michael John Piskanin, Jr.), Petitioner v. Kelly L. BANACH and William H. Platt and James B. Martin, Esq. and Tammy Ferguson, Warden, Respondents.
No. 21 MM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 9, 2015.
